PROVENANCE:
The following 2 codes were added, as they are highly prevalent and were missed by Hawkins et al (2013) and ourselves, likely due to searching too low down hierarchies:
G3… 00: Ischaemic heart disease
G3… 13: IHD – Ischaemic heart disease

An attempt at a comprehensive Read code list covering angina, myocardial infarction and IHD procedures to sensitively capture all IHD.

We used the codelists developed for the following article: Hawkins NM, Scholes S, Bajekal M et al. The UK National Health Service: delivering equitable treatment across the spectrum of coronary disease. Circ Cardiovasc Qual Outcomes 2013;6(2):208-216.

Dr Payne, Dr Edwards and Anna Cassell then used the CPRD Read term browser and related hierarchies to add a small number of additional codes based on clinical experience, the list was then checked by Dr Gerza.
